name: Legion Lovin'
description:
Have you ever wanted to date the infamous Vulpes Inculta from Fallout: New Vegas? Well now you can!

Legion Lovin'  is a fan-made dating simulator.  It takes approximately 30 minutes to achieve all four endings, and what happens will change based on your choices. Be sure to explore all dialogue options!

Notes: 

  • Romance a handsome legionary for the low, low price of your morality
  • You get to have a Tragic Backstory™ 
  • Legion in the streets, soft boy in the sheets  
  • Sadly, no frick frack. Quench your thirst elsewhere.
  • Contains whips and chains (Warning:  Not exciting)
  • The more Vulpes strips, the better you're doing 
  • We hate the title too 

Hint: Press "V" while playing to have our very enthusiastic narrator read the story for you!

Based on Fallout: New Vegas (2010), which was published by Bethesda Softworks and developed by Obsidian Entertainment.
